title: HOUR 1 - Rams, LIV Tour, Lakers, Ravens
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Rams, LIV Tour, Lakers, Ravens
description:
Thoughts on Aaron Donald's new contract and why the Rams are America's Team

Golfers should be able to play in the LIV Tour if they want

The Lakers are saying the right things, but will it work?

The Ravens should pay Lamar Jackson

 

Guest: Chris Mannix

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
